body.p: The results and financial position of an entity whose functional currency is not the currency of a hyperinflationary economy shall be translated into a different presentation currency using the following procedures:

li.p: assets and liabilities for each statement of financial position presented (ie including comparatives ) shall be translated at the closing rate at the date of that statement of financial position;
income and expenses for each statement presenting profit or loss and other comprehensive income (ie including comparatives) shall be translated at exchange rates at the dates of the transactions; and
all resulting exchange differences shall be recognised in other comprehensive income.
